content.p: A winning combination of personal support, facilities and collections enables our researchers to produce work of international impact. Advocacy, excellence and partnerships Development, support and opportunities Project development, support and funding Supporting digital research across the arts and humanities Measuring how we read and respond to language Incubating innovation in production and audience engagement Scientific exploration of physical remains Composition, performance, recording, experimentation Analyse documents using a range of text mining tools Unique collection of Cuban publications Historic archives and preservation National collection for place names research Research and public engagement with the past Specialist publications, scores, recordings and databases For course and admissions enquiries see our enquiry page For Faculty contacts see our contacts page
